00071 enum ma_valid {
00072         MA_INODE     = 1 << 0,
00073         MA_LOV       = 1 << 1,
00074         MA_FLAGS     = 1 << 2,
00075         MA_LMV       = 1 << 3,
00076         MA_ACL_DEF   = 1 << 4,
00077         MA_LOV_DEF   = 1 << 5,
00078         MA_HSM       = 1 << 6,
00079         MA_PFID      = 1 << 7,
00080         MA_LMV_DEF   = 1 << 8,
00081 };

00083 typedef enum {

00085         MDL_EX       = 1,

00087         MDL_PR       = 4,
00088         MDL_CW       = 8,

00090         MDL_NL       = 32,
00091         MDL_GROUP    = 64,
00092         MDL_MAXMODE

00104 /* memory structure for hsm attributes
00105  * for fields description see the on disk structure hsm_attrs
00106  * which is defined in lustre_idl.h
00107  */
00108 struct md_hsm {
00109         __u32   mh_compat;
00110         __u32   mh_flags;
00111         __u64   mh_arch_id;
00112         __u64   mh_arch_ver;
00113 };
00114 
00115 struct md_attr {
00116         __u64                   ma_valid;
00117         __u64                   ma_need;
00118         __u64                   ma_attr_flags;
00119         struct lu_attr          ma_attr;
00120         struct lu_fid           ma_pfid;
00121         struct md_hsm           ma_hsm;
00122         struct lov_mds_md      *ma_lmm;
00123         union lmv_mds_md       *ma_lmv;
00124         void                   *ma_acl;
00125         int                     ma_lmm_size;
00126         int                     ma_lmv_size;
00127         int                     ma_acl_size;
00128 };
00129 
00131 struct md_op_spec {
00132         union {
00134                 const char               *sp_symname;
00136                 struct md_spec_reg {
00137                         const void *eadata;
00138                         int  eadatalen;
00139                 } sp_ea;
00140         } u;
00141 
00143         __u64      sp_cr_flags;
00144 
00146         unsigned int no_create:1,
00147                      sp_cr_lookup:1, /* do lookup sanity check or not. */
00148                      sp_rm_entry:1,  /* only remove name entry */
00149                      sp_permitted:1, /* do not check permission */
00150                      sp_migrate_close:1; /* close the file during migrate */
00152         mdl_mode_t sp_cr_mode;
00153 
00155         const struct dt_index_features *sp_feat;
00156 };
00157 
00158 union ldlm_policy_data;
00162 struct md_object_operations {
00163         int (*moo_permission)(const struct lu_env *env,
00164                               struct md_object *pobj, struct md_object *cobj,
00165                               struct md_attr *attr, int mask);
00166

00168                             struct md_attr *attr);
00169 
00170         int (*moo_attr_set)(const struct lu_env *env, struct md_object *obj,
00171                             const struct md_attr *attr);
00172 
00173         int (*moo_xattr_get)(const struct lu_env *env, struct md_object *obj,
00174                              struct lu_buf *buf, const char *name);
00175 
00176         int (*moo_xattr_list)(const struct lu_env *env, struct md_object *obj,
00177                               struct lu_buf *buf);
00178 
00179         int (*moo_xattr_set)(const struct lu_env *env, struct md_object *obj,
00180                              const struct lu_buf *buf, const char *name,
00181                              int fl);
00182 
00183         int (*moo_xattr_del)(const struct lu_env *env, struct md_object *obj,
00184                              const char *name);
00185 
00187         int (*moo_swap_layouts)(const struct lu_env *env,
00188                                struct md_object *obj1, struct md_object *obj2,
00189                                __u64 flags);
00190 
00192         int (*moo_readpage)(const struct lu_env *env, struct md_object *obj,
00193                             const struct lu_rdpg *rdpg);
00194 
00195         int (*moo_readlink)(const struct lu_env *env, struct md_object *obj,
00196                             struct lu_buf *buf);
00197         int (*moo_changelog)(const struct lu_env *env,
00198                              enum changelog_rec_type type, int flags,
00199                              struct md_object *obj);
00200 
00201         int (*moo_open)(const struct lu_env *env,
00202                         struct md_object *obj, int flag);
00203 
00204         int (*moo_close)(const struct lu_env *env, struct md_object *obj,
00205                          struct md_attr *ma, int mode);
00206 
00207         int (*moo_object_sync)(const struct lu_env *, struct md_object *);
00208 
00209         int (*moo_object_lock)(const struct lu_env *env, struct md_object *obj,
00210                                struct lustre_handle *lh,
00211                                struct ldlm_enqueue_info *einfo,
00212                                union ldlm_policy_data *policy);

00214                                  struct md_object *obj,
00215                                  struct ldlm_enqueue_info *einfo,
00216                                  union ldlm_policy_data *policy);

00281 struct md_device {
00282         struct lu_device                   md_lu_dev;
00283         const struct md_device_operations *md_ops;
00284 };
00285 
00286 struct md_object {
00287         struct lu_object                   mo_lu;
00288         const struct md_object_operations *mo_ops;
00289         const struct md_dir_operations    *mo_dir_ops;
00290 };

00292 static inline struct md_device *lu2md_dev(const struct lu_device *d)
00293 {
00294         LASSERT(IS_ERR(d) || lu_device_is_md(d));
00295         return container_of0(d, struct md_device, md_lu_dev);
00296 }
00297 
00298 static inline struct lu_device *md2lu_dev(struct md_device *d)
00299 {
00300         return &d->md_lu_dev;
00301 }
00302 
00303 static inline struct md_object *lu2md(const struct lu_object *o)
00304 {
00305         LASSERT(o == NULL || IS_ERR(o) || lu_device_is_md(o->lo_dev));
00306         return container_of0(o, struct md_object, mo_lu);
00307 }
00308 
00309 static inline int md_device_init(struct md_device *md, struct lu_device_type *t)
00310 {
00311         return lu_device_init(&md->md_lu_dev, t);
00312 }
00313 
00314 static inline void md_device_fini(struct md_device *md)
00315 {
00316         lu_device_fini(&md->md_lu_dev);
00317 }
00318 
00319 static inline struct md_object *md_object_find_slice(const struct lu_env *env,
00320                                                      struct md_device *md,
00321                                                      const struct lu_fid *f)
00322 {
00323         return lu2md(lu_object_find_slice(env, md2lu_dev(md), f, NULL));
00324 }

00332                                 int mask)
00333 {

00336 }

00405 static inline int mo_swap_layouts(const struct lu_env *env,
00406                                   struct md_object *o1,
00407                                   struct md_object *o2, __u64 flags)
00408 {
00409         LASSERT(o1->mo_ops->moo_swap_layouts);
00410         LASSERT(o2->mo_ops->moo_swap_layouts);
00411         if (o1->mo_ops->moo_swap_layouts != o2->mo_ops->moo_swap_layouts)
00412                 return -EPERM;
00413         return o1->mo_ops->moo_swap_layouts(env, o1, o2, flags);
00414 }
00415

00417                           struct md_object *m,

00421         return m->mo_ops->moo_open(env, m, flags);
00422 }

00466 static inline int mdo_lookup(const struct lu_env *env,
00467                              struct md_object *p,
00468                              const struct lu_name *lname,
00469                              struct lu_fid *f,
00470                              struct md_op_spec *spec)
00471 {
00472         LASSERT(p->mo_dir_ops->mdo_lookup);
00473         return p->mo_dir_ops->mdo_lookup(env, p, lname, f, spec);
00474 }
00475 
00476 static inline mdl_mode_t mdo_lock_mode(const struct lu_env *env,
00477                                        struct md_object *mo,
00478                                        mdl_mode_t lm)
00479 {
00480         if (mo->mo_dir_ops->mdo_lock_mode == NULL)
00481                 return MDL_MINMODE;
00482         return mo->mo_dir_ops->mdo_lock_mode(env, mo, lm);
00483 }

00583 struct lu_ucred {
00584         __u32                    uc_valid;
00585         __u32                    uc_o_uid;
00586         __u32                    uc_o_gid;
00587         __u32                    uc_o_fsuid;
00588         __u32                    uc_o_fsgid;
00589         __u32                    uc_uid;
00590         __u32                    uc_gid;
00591         __u32                    uc_fsuid;
00592         __u32                    uc_fsgid;
00593         __u32                    uc_suppgids[2];
00594         cfs_cap_t                uc_cap;
00595         __u32                    uc_umask;
00596         struct group_info       *uc_ginfo;
00597         struct md_identity      *uc_identity;
00598         char                     uc_jobid[LUSTRE_JOBID_SIZE];
00599 };

00601 struct lu_ucred *lu_ucred(const struct lu_env *env);
00602 
00603 struct lu_ucred *lu_ucred_check(const struct lu_env *env);
00604 
00605 struct lu_ucred *lu_ucred_assert(const struct lu_env *env);
00606 
00607 int lu_ucred_global_init(void);
00608 
00609 void lu_ucred_global_fini(void);
00610 
00611 #define md_cap_t(x) (x)
00612 
00613 #define MD_CAP_TO_MASK(x) (1 << (x))
00614 
00615 #define md_cap_raised(c, flag) (md_cap_t(c) & MD_CAP_TO_MASK(flag))
00616 
00617 /* capable() is copied from linux kernel! */
00618 static inline int md_capable(struct lu_ucred *uc, cfs_cap_t cap)
00619 {
00620         if (md_cap_raised(uc->uc_cap, cap))
00621                 return 1;
00622         return 0;
00623 }
00624 
00626 #endif /* _LINUX_MD_OBJECT_H */
